author: Matthew Impelli
title: Coronavirus Updates In Michigan, Florida and Louisiana: COVID-19 Cases, Death Toll and More
description: The novel coronavirus has continued to spread across the country, infecting people in every state across the U.S. While New York remains the virus's epicenter in the U.S., a number of other states like Michigan, Louisiana and Florida have also been severely i…
